aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted solution partner in the packaging industry since 1990

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 1990, Bakırcılar Packaging has been operating in the packaging industry for over 30 years. We offer services in a wide range from packaging products to industrial cleaning products, from stationery products to fast-moving consumer goods.
story.paragraph2: By prioritizing customer satisfaction, we have become a trusted brand in the industry with quality products and on-time delivery guarantee. With our experienced staff and modern production facilities, we provide solutions for projects of all sizes.
story.paragraph3: With our environmentally friendly production approach, use of recyclable materials and sustainable business model, we act thinking about both today and the future.

aboutPage.visionDetailed: To become a leading production and supply company in the packaging industry by meeting constantly changing customer demands at the highest level in the Turkish and global market.
aboutPage.missionDetailed: To contribute to our customers' success by offering environmentally friendly and innovative packaging solutions without compromising our principles of quality, speed and reliability.
